JOB DESCRIPTION: Jobs Details     1 Modifying software to fix errors, adapt it to new hardware, improve its performance, or upgrade interfaces    2 Directing system testing and validation procedures    3 Directing software programming and documentation development    4 Consulting with departments or customers on project status and proposals    5 Working with customers or departments on technical issues including software system design and maintenance    6 Analyzing information to recommend and plan the installation of new systems or modifications of an existing system    7 Consulting with engineering staff to evaluate software-hardware interfaces and develop specifications and performance requirements    8 Designing and developing software systems using scientific analysis and mathematical models to predict and measure outcomes and design consequences    9 Preparing reports on programming project specifications, activities, or status
